entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1 except plus 2 near Lake Erie. Patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Low minus 1 except plus 2 near Lake Erie. Patchy frost. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
